00001 /**********************************************************************
00002 * $Id$          wdt_reset_test.c                        2010-05-21
00003 */
00025 #include "lpc17xx_wdt.h"
00026 #include "lpc17xx_libcfg.h"
00027 #include "lpc17xx_pinsel.h"
00028 #include "debug_frmwrk.h"
00029 #include "lpc17xx_gpio.h"
00030 
00031 /* Example group ----------------------------------------------------------- */
00037 /************************** PRIVATE DEFINITIONS *************************/
00038 //#define MCB_LPC_1768
00039 #define IAR_LPC_1768
00040 
00041 //Watchodog time out in 5 seconds
00042 #define WDT_TIMEOUT     5000000
00043 
00044 
00045 /************************** PRIVATE VARIABLES *************************/
00046 uint8_t menu1[] =
00047 "********************************************************************************\n\r"
00048 "This Welcome Screen below will executive after reset event \n\r"
00049 "Hello NXP Semiconductors \n\r"
00050 " Watch dog timer reset when timeout demo \n\r"
00051 "\t - MCU: LPC17xx \n\r"
00052 "\t - Core: Cortex M3 \n\r"
00053 "\t - Communicate via: UART0 - 115200 bps \n\r"
00054 " Use WDT with Internal RC OSC, reset mode, timeout = 5 seconds \n\r"
00055 " To reset MCU when time out. After reset, program will determine what cause of "
00056 " last reset time (external reset or WDT time-out)\n\r"
00057 "********************************************************************************\n\r";
00058 uint8_t info1[] = "Last MCU reset caused by WDT TimeOut!\n\r";
00059 uint8_t info2[] = "Last MCU reset caused by External!\n\r";
00060 
00061 /*-------------------------MAIN FUNCTION------------------------------*/
00062 /*********************************************************************/
00067 int c_entry(void)
00068 {
00069         /* Initialize debug via UART0
00070          * – 115200bps
00071          * – 8 data bit
00072          * – No parity
00073          * – 1 stop bit
00074          * – No flow control
00075          */
00076         debug_frmwrk_init();
00077 
00078         // print welcome screen
00079         _DBG(menu1);
00080 
00081         // Read back TimeOut flag to determine previous timeout reset
00082         if (WDT_ReadTimeOutFlag()){
00083                 _DBG_(info1);
00084                 // Clear WDT TimeOut
00085                 WDT_ClrTimeOutFlag();
00086         } else{
00087                 _DBG_(info2);
00088         }
00089 
00090         // Initialize WDT, IRC OSC, interrupt mode, timeout = 5000000us = 5s
00091         WDT_Init(WDT_CLKSRC_IRC, WDT_MODE_RESET);
00092         // Start watchdog with timeout given
00093         WDT_Start(WDT_TIMEOUT);
00094 
00095         //infinite loop to wait chip reset from WDT
00096         while(1);
00097 
00098         return 0;
00099 }
00100 
00101 /* Support required entry point for other toolchain */
00102 int main (void)
00103 {
00104         return c_entry();
00105 }

00111 * @param[in]    line assert_param error line source number

00114 void check_failed(uint8_t *file, uint32_t line)
